pr_title: OWLS-80522 Domain status ordering, OWLS-80144 Ordered rolling upgrade

timeline.message: Domain.getServers() should return servers in order

timeline.bodyText: How about something more generous than 6 - like 20?  The numbers we're padding come from the customer and there's not much need to be stingy here.
timeline.author: tbarnes-us

replies.bodyText: done. Yes, we should be more generous.
replies.author: alai8

timeline.message: update getSortingString to handle up to 20 digits
rolling upgrade clusters sorted by cluster names
ServerStatus isAdminServer excluded from json schema
